name.title: Name
name.description: The name that will appear in your homebridge log.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: What will show under Manufacturer in accessory settings.

model.title: Model
model.description: What will show under Model in accessory settings.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: What will show under Serial Number in accessory settings.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The number of seconds between the unlocking and locking notifications. Defaults to 10 seconds.

shellyUniStatusUrl.title: Status URL
shellyUniStatusUrl.description: URL which retrives the status of the Shelly Uni.

shellyUniStatusJsonPath.title: Status JSON Path
shellyUniStatusJsonPath.description: Path in JSON structure to the field that changes upon ringing.

shellyUniStatusThreshold.title: Status Threshold
shellyUniStatusThreshold.description: The minimum value of the field that changes upon ringing.

shellyUniTalkUrl.title: Talk URL
shellyUniTalkUrl.description: URL which triggers Talk button on the Shelly Uni.

shellyUniOpenUrl.title: Open URL
shellyUniOpenUrl.description: URL which triggers Open button on the Shelly Uni.

shellyUniButtonsTimeout.title: Buttons timeout
shellyUniButtonsTimeout.description: The number of seconds between "pressing" the buttons. Defaults to 1 second.

shellyUniRingSuppressionTimeout.title: Ring suppression timeout
shellyUniRingSuppressionTimeout.description: The number of seconds to ignore any other changing in the status of the Shelly Uni (changing that implies that the intercom is ringing).
